data.name: JuXiaoYou
data.detailed_description:
JuXiaoYou is an APP designed for OC creation, and the original module OC design concept allows OC's creation to enjoy the general feeling of building blocks. Users can easily manage OC content, collect inspiration, and create and share OC through Ju XiaoYou


We bring a variety of OC creation modes to make it easy for users to find a balance between text OC settings and module OC settings. Let you enjoy the creative process of OC more, rather than sinking into the empty imagination of no action.
data.about_the_game:
JuXiaoYou is an APP designed for OC creation, and the original module OC design concept allows OC's creation to enjoy the general feeling of building blocks. Users can easily manage OC content, collect inspiration, and create and share OC through Ju XiaoYou


We bring a variety of OC creation modes to make it easy for users to find a balance between text OC settings and module OC settings. Let you enjoy the creative process of OC more, rather than sinking into the empty imagination of no action.
data.short_description: JuXiaoYou is an APP designed for OC creation, and the original module OC design concept allows OC's creation to enjoy the general feeling of building blocks. Users can easily manage OC content, collect inspiration, and create and share OC through Ju XiaoYou

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Celeron E3200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics HD4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 20H2
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics HD4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
